Basa, nke a na-akpọ Basa-Benue, a na-akpokwa ya Abacha, Abatsa, Bassa-Komo, Bassa, Rubasa, Rubassa, bụ asụsụ Kainji a na-asụ n'etiti Naịjirịa, na akuku Bassa, Ankpa, Nasarawa, na Kwali Local Government Areas na obodo Makurdi. Blench (2008) na-ekwu na Basa-Makurdi, Basa-Gurara (nke Gurara), na Basa-Kwali bụ ụdị dị iche iche site na Bassa nke Bassa LGA na ndị ọzọ na-asụ bassa bụ Bassa Nge.
Ndị na-asụ asụsụ Basa na-asukarị Igala ma ọ bụ Nupe.
Àtụ:Languages of NigeriaAsusu ndi NigiriaÀtụ:Platoid languages
